annotations.description: While workshopping riffs on the classic hot toddy, we wanted to create something that played close enough to the original tune, but felt a bit more tony, m
annotations.title: Chartreuse Toddy Cocktail Recipe | PUNCH

textContent:
1 1/2 ounces Cognac
3/4 ounce green Chartreuse
1/2 ounce lemon juice
1/2 ounce honey syrup 

Pour into mug and top with hot water. 

https://punchdrink.com/recipes/chartreuse-toddy/
title: Chartreuse Toddy
